name: Charmeleon
description: When it swings its burning tail, it elevates the temperature to unbearably high levels.

abilities.name: Blaze
abilities.effect: When this Pokémon has 1/3 or less of its HP remaining, its fire-type moves inflict 1.5× as much regular damage.
abilities.description: Ups FIRE moves in a pinch.

abilities.name: Solar Power
abilities.effect: During strong sunlight, this Pokémon has 1.5× its Special Attack but takes 1/8 of its maximum HP in damage after each turn.
abilities.description: Boosts Sp. Atk, but lowers HP in sunshine.
